about_the_game:
―――A planet called 「Bitter」, turned into a desert due to the impact of interstellar wars.

The life of a girl, who had been scavenging for parts and treasures scattered across the desert to survive, begins to change dramatically due to an encounter with the "Oracle."

―――Strangely mutated Mechas, increasingly aggressive AIs, and bizarre phenomena occurring all over the planet...

Explore the many secrets hidden within the ruins of this planet plunged into chaos by a massive energy strike. Build relationships with various characters, gather new information, and move closer to uncovering the truth as you face the strange occurrences happening across the land!

―――THE STARBITES

STARBITES is a story-driven RPG set on the war-torn, ruined planet of "Bitter." In this adventure, you will strengthen your partner Mecha and meet various allies while growing throughout the story. You play as Lukida, a rookie debris collector scavenging spaceship parts and relics in Delight City. Together with the laid-back, kind-hearted drinker Gwendol and the calm engineer Badger, who solidly supports the duo, you'll embark on a thrilling adventure.

…Can Lukida reach the truth at the edge of the universe?

▶ ‘Delight City’ on the planet of ‘Vitter,’ where everyone has their own story.

Delight City, a lively and free-spirited place, is a tower-shaped city full of unique personalities. Though it's slowly being swallowed by the sand, the people of this city continue to trade materials and information to survive day by day.

The city holds a ‘hidden area’ that no one has yet discovered. Find clues by interacting with various NPCs and special objects, progress the story, and unlock new floors of the city!

▶ Adventure through the desert planet and discover new regions.

Each chapter introduces terrifying bosses and even stronger allies waiting for you. What kind of world do they know? Build relationships with your companions and listen to their stories.

Set out on an adventure with your reliable partner Mecha that will protect you in the barren desert! The world made of sand is vast, and the secrets hidden within may be even larger.

▶ Turn-based battles with your very own Mecha.

Breaking the stereotype of turn-based battles being boring—Drivers High!

As you attack or take damage, the DH gauge charges. Once it's full, you can activate Drivers High, allowing you to take another action immediately, regardless of the timeline order! Use Drivers High at just the right moment to enhance your existing skills, change their attributes, strengthen their power, or add extra effects, disrupting your enemies’ strategies and making battles exciting!

▶ Strengthen your Mecha with materials gathered from your adventures.

Defeat enemies in battle to earn rewards or explore the fields to collect materials. Use the items you collect to upgrade your Mecha’s weapons, armor, engine, and core. Customize your Mecha to suit your style and enjoy the game your way!

▶ Build a strategic party with companions of various abilities!

Create a party using companions with distinctive Mechas, positioning them as either combat members or supporters to suit the situation. With the right party composition, you can gain the upper hand in battles. The tide of battle is in your hands!

▶ A story that will captivate you with the hidden depths of the planet.

Embark on a journey to uncover the tragic stories and secrets born from the vastness of space. With a solid scenario, immersive direction, and characters brought to life by passionate voice actors, the story unfolds with great immersion. Together with your many companions, reach the truth!

name: THE STARBITES

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: ntel® Core™ i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 3 GB or AMD Radeon™ RX 560 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel™ Core i7-3770 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6 GB or AMD Radeon™ RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: The story of a girl's growth and adventure on a vast desert planet, "Bitter."
supported_languages:
Korean*, English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
